page.title: 08Gateway Supermarket Newport
page.content: This{supermarket}opened for{trade}on 26th March 1985, this{event}providing competition for 3 other large stores in Newport. The entrance is through a carpark in Avenue Rd. The shop sells a variety of products ranging from freezer foods to household items. The shop is open from 8.30am to 6.00pm six days a week with two late night untill 8.00pm on the most popular shopping days of Thursdays and Fridays. Accurate{food}prices on a selectian of items in may 1985 are as follows:- pasteurised milk.1 pint.20p. Tea bags.40(125g.)88p. Instant coffee 100g. Â£1.42p.Eggs.6 size 4. 43p.Sugar 1kg.44p. Bread large white sliced.31p. Self-service shopping is done using a wire basket or trolly and payment is made by queing at a cash till.
